title: hurryplane的作者页
content:
[[include :scp-wiki-cn:theme:the-flowing-night-sky]]

[[div style="float:right; width: 20%; padding: 0 2%"]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/div]]

[[size 120%]]因为不会写文章，所以这里都是翻译作品。欢迎各位大佬提出指导或修改意见。[[/size]]

+ 翻译完成的SCP系列
++ SCP系列 5
* **[[[*http://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/scp-4424|SCP-4424]]] - 无终班列** _
//[[span style="color:grey"]]译自：[[[*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-4424|SCP-4424]]] - The Train With No Final Station[[/span]]//

* **[[[*http://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/scp-4543|SCP-4543]]] - 死无折扣** _
//[[span style="color:grey"]]译自：[[[*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-4543|SCP-4543]]] - Dead Men Sell No Sales[[/span]]//

* **[[[*http://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/scp-4668|SCP-4668]]] - 自我非我** _
//[[span style="color:grey"]]译自：[[[*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-4668|SCP-4668]]] - Since I Left Me[[/span]]//

* **[[[*http://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/scp-4721|SCP-4721]]] - 欧几里得** _
//[[span style="color:grey"]]译自：[[[*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-4721|SCP-4721]]] - Euclid[[/span]]//

* **[[[*http://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/scp-4901|SCP-4901]]] - 谨以此纪念Rudy Benson。** _
//[[span style="color:grey"]]译自：[[[*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-4901|SCP-4901]]] - Remember Rudy Benson.[[/span]]//

* **[[[*http://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/scp-4902|SCP-4902]]] - 保持“冷”静** _
//[[span style="color:grey"]]译自：[[[*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-4902|SCP-4902]]] - Keep Your Cool[[/span]]//

* **[[[*http://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/scp-4903|SCP-4903]]] - 无穷无尽，此即永恒** _
//[[span style="color:grey"]]译自：[[[*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-4903|SCP-4903]]] - Eternity, Served Cold[[/span]]//

++ SCP系列 6
* **[[[*http://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/scp-5390|SCP-5390]]] - 要来一份塔马利吗？** _
//[[span style="color:grey"]]译自：[[[*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-5390|SCP-5390]]] - Do You Want A Tamale?[[/span]]//

++ SCP系列 7
* **[[[*http://scp-wiki-cn.wikidot.com/scp-6177|SCP-6177]]] - 过度生长** _
//[[span style="color:grey"]]译自：[[[*https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-6177|SCP-6177]]] - Overgrown[[/span]]//
